title: What about Kayn?
body: Okay, so whats the deal with you guys making new skins for champions that already have 4+ skins and champions like Kayn are left with the 1 skin they where released with? It really makes no sense and it makes the game look/ feel very weird, especially if you main a champ with 1 skin that been out for more than a year.

replies.body: what the hell is that? lol
Star Guardian Kayn, I know its bad sorry.
I might try that, thanks for the idea!
I am also waiting for a new Kayn skin. Riot is probably too lazy to make the 3 models needed for a Kayn skin.
Could be....But if that's truly the case then why was Kayn created in the 1st place? Riot need to get their shitt together.
